=API for mmap=
Usage: 
{{{
(ns <your-namespace>
  (:use clojure.contrib.mmap))
}}}


==Public Variables and Functions==
Shortcuts:
[#(_buffer-stream_buf) buffer-stream] [#(_mmap_f) mmap] [#(_slurp_f) slurp] 

----
===(_buffer-stream_ buf)===
<pre> Returns an InputStream for a ByteBuffer, such as returned by mmap.</pre>

[http://code.google.com/p/clojure-contrib/source/browse/trunk/src/clojure/contrib/mmap.clj#35 Source] [http://www.google.com/codesearch?hl=en&lr=&q=buffer-stream+package%3Ahttp%3A%2F%2Fclojure-contrib\.googlecode\.com&sbtn=Search Search for references in contrib]----
===(_mmap_ f)===
<pre> Memory-map the file named f.  Returns a ByteBuffer.</pre>

[http://code.google.com/p/clojure-contrib/source/browse/trunk/src/clojure/contrib/mmap.clj#23 Source] [http://www.google.com/codesearch?hl=en&lr=&q=mmap+package%3Ahttp%3A%2F%2Fclojure-contrib\.googlecode\.com&sbtn=Search Search for references in contrib]----
===(_slurp_ f)===
<pre> Reads the file named by f and returns it as a string.</pre>
